item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. macOS Sequoia is available today (92 points | 69 comments)
2. Launch HN: Silurian (YC S24) – Simulate the Earth (209 points | 109 comments)
3. A Spreadsheet and a Debugger Walk into a Shell (42 points | discuss)
4. Datomic and Content Addressable Techniques (80 points | 23 comments)
5. Amazon tells employees to return to office five days a week (240 points | 258 comments)
6. Apple Watch sleep apnea detection gets FDA approval (191 points | 161 comments)
7. What If Ozempic Is Just a Good Thing? (36 points | 28 comments)
8. Fair: A Go library for serving resources fairly (151 points | 32 comments)
9. S6 – skarnet's small supervision suite (36 points | 10 comments)
10. TouchArcade Is Shutting Down (63 points | 29 comments)
11. GoGoGrandparent (YC S16) Is Hiring Back End and Full-Stack Engineers ( | hide)
12. D&D is Anti-Medieval (204 points | 270 comments)
13. Show HN: Sisi – Semantic Image Search CLI tool, locally without third party APIs (82 points | 30 comments)
14. Fractran: Computer architecture based on the multiplication of fractions (65 points | 13 comments)
15. Python in Excel – Available Now (34 points | 7 comments)
16. How to Make HTTPS Verifiable (4 points | 1 comment)
17. Show HN: JAQT – JavaScript Queries and Transformations (73 points | 23 comments)
18. Nothing: Simply Do Nothing (358 points | 151 comments)
19. Thoughts and Observations in the Wake of Apple's 'It's Glowtime' Keynote (8 points | 1 comment)
20. Revisiting Overture's Global Geospatial Datasets (3 points | discuss)
21. How to Succeed in Mr Beast Production (Leaked PDF) (1832 points | 1156 comments)
22. Ask HN: What runs L4-related microkernels/hypervisors these days? (36 points | 26 comments)
23. Speech Dictation Mode for Emacs (111 points | 27 comments)
24. Attacking PowerShell Clixml Deserialization (38 points | 9 comments)
25. Plain Text Accounting (PTA) (279 points | 101 comments)
26. g1: Using Llama-3.1 70B on Groq to create o1-like reasoning chains (300 points | 136 comments)
27. Ask HN: Does anyone use sound effects in their dev environment? (135 points | 210 comments)
28. Amazon mandates five days a week in office starting next year (3 points | discuss)
29. How to Lead Your Team When the House Is on Fire (349 points | 177 comments)
30. The First HTML LSP That Reports Syntax Errors (205 points | 62 comments)
